sentences.sContent: The feeder fed new feed to pigs so that they laid on fresh.
sentences.sContent_eng: The feeder fed new feed to pigs so that they laid on fresh.
sentences.sCn: 饲养员用新饲料喂猪好让它们长肉。

sentences.sContent: Both females and the baby were eating carrots near the feeder, absolutely calm, one by one, trying to feel the taste of each carrot.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both females and the baby were eating carrots near the feeder, absolutely calm, one by one, trying to feel the taste of each carrot.
sentences.sCn: 雌性大猩猩和幼年猩猩则在饲养员旁边一根接一根地平静进食。 像是在试图品尝每根萝卜的味道。

synos.tran: 支线；喂食器；奶瓶；饲养员；[地理][水文]支流
